extension.name: YouMomentum Slider
extension.author: YouJoomla.com
extension.description: YouMomentum News Slider ver 2.0 for Joomla 1.6x

field.name: module_template
field.label: Select default module template
field.description: You can create custom module templates for Youomentum News Slider Simply copy modules/mod_youm_slider/tmpl/Default folder , rename it to your own template name and edit default.php within your template folder to your liking. Once you have created your module template , your template name will be visible here. You can also copy your template folder to your template/html/mod_youm_slider/ folder and create custom overides for each module instance. To get you started we have created blank module template name New

field.name: full_player_width
field.label: Player width
field.description: Usualy width of the containing div

field.name: player_height
field.label: Player Height
field.description: Please try to have height devidable by number of visible playist items ( last setting ). Example: 300px height , number of visible items 5 , each playlist item would be 50px high,

field.name: slide_width
field.label: Slide width
field.description: Usualy width of your intro images

field.name: intro_desc_width
field.label: Slide intro text width
field.description: Can be px or percentage

field.name: intro_desc_height
field.label: Slide intro text height
field.description: Leave at auto to adjust itself automatically by the amount of intro text. Define in px. Example: 250px

field.name: playlist_width
field.label: Playlist width
field.description: Calculate Player width minus Slide width

field.name: playlist_align
field.label: Playlist align
field.description: Left or right

field.name: show_thumb
field.label: Show playlist thumbnail image
field.description: Show playlist thumbnail image

field.name: thumb_width
field.label: Thumbnail width
field.description: Thumbnail widtht

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: get_items
field.label: News items category
field.description: In this category there must be min 1 news item published

field.name: item
field.label: Select specific items
field.description: Choose specific news items you would like to display

field.name: getspecific
field.label: Specific items list and order
field.description: First select few items from setting above. Drag and drop to re-order items. Click the remove icon to remove an item from the list. Note that the items reorder works only if you set News items ordering to Specific items order!

field.name: ordering
field.label: News Items Ordering
field.description: Choose news items order sequence. Note that Specific items order is the display order of your Specific items order setting above

field.name: nitems
field.label: Number of news items to display
field.description: Number of news items to display

field.name: chars
field.label: Number of characters to display
field.description: Number of characters to display

field.name: chars_nav
field.label: Max number of playlist intro text characters to display
field.description: Max number of slide intro text characters to display

field.name: autoSlide
field.label: Auto slide speed
field.description: If set to 0 slider will not slide automaticaly

field.name: startElem
field.label: First news item to slide
field.description: This goes by playlist ordering. Example if 6 news items second slide from above will slide first

field.name: visibleItems
field.label: Number of visible playlist items
field.description: If you set player height at 400px than this should be set at 4
